Title: Call of the Hunt
Description:
<Roki drops the note into your hand>

$n, Clan Shikaar invites you to the Grand Hunt. Meet with Trainer Frodrum in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Trainer Frodrum in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
RewardText: Dragonrider! Your aid will be welcome in the coming hunts.
